product.title: Infinitipro by Conair Frizz Free 1.5-inch Hot Air Brush BC600
product.description: Put the power of salon styling in the palm of your hand with this versatile hot air brush. The ceramic coated, 1?-inch thermal barrel ensures even heat for exceptional performance, while ionic technology eliminates frizz, resulting in smooth, shiny, healthy-looking hair. Equipped with 2 heat settings to dry hair quickly yet gently as you style, this beauty essential features a mix of nylon and ball-tipped bristles for optimal comfort and control, plus a cool setting to lock in your style.

product.description_full:
Put the power of salon styling in the palm of your hand with this versatile hot air brush. The ceramic coated, 1?-inch thermal barrel ensures even heat for exceptional performance, while ionic technology eliminates frizz, resulting in smooth, shiny, healthy-looking hair. Equipped with 2 heat settings to dry hair quickly yet gently as you style, this beauty essential features a mix of nylon and ball-tipped bristles for optimal comfort and control, plus a cool setting to lock in your style. * 1?" thermal barrel with ceramic coating
 * Professional power handle
 * Ionic technology to break free from frizz
 * Nylon & ball-tipped bristles for comfort and control
 * 2 heat settings plus cool setting
product.description_full_html:
Put the power of salon styling in the palm of your hand with this versatile hot air brush. The ceramic coated, 1?-inch thermal barrel ensures even heat for exceptional performance, while ionic technology eliminates frizz, resulting in smooth, shiny, healthy-looking hair. Equipped with 2 heat settings to dry hair quickly yet gently as you style, this beauty essential features a mix of nylon and ball-tipped bristles for optimal comfort and control, plus a cool setting to lock in your style.
  • 1?" thermal barrel with ceramic coating
  • Professional power handle
  • Ionic technology to break free from frizz
  • Nylon & ball-tipped bristles for comfort and control
  • 2 heat settings plus cool setting

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
